title: Research Paper Structure
description: Defines the mandatory sections and writing rules for a research document.

sections.name: Abstract
sections.purpose: Summarize the purpose, methods, and findings of the paper in under 200 words.

sections.name: Introduction
sections.purpose: Provide background and clearly define the problem or research question.

sections.name: Methodology
sections.purpose: Describe how the research was conducted, including data collection and analysis.

sections.name: Results
sections.purpose: Present the main findings objectively with evidence.

sections.name: Discussion
sections.purpose: Interpret the findings and compare them to existing research.

sections.name: Conclusion
sections.purpose: Summarize the overall insights and suggest future research directions.

rules: Each section should have at least 100 words.
